typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		lpep_pickup_datetime as string,
		lpep_dropoff_datetime as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		RatecodeID as string,
		PULocationID as string,
		DOLocationID as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		extra as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		ehail_fee as string,
		improvement_surcharge as string,
		total_amount as float,
		payment_type as string,
		trip_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		lpep_pickup_datetime as string,
		lpep_dropoff_datetime as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		RatecodeID as string,
		PULocationID as string,
		DOLocationID as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		extra as string,
		mta_tax as string,
		tip_amount as string,
		tolls_amount as string,
		ehail_fee as string,
		improvement_surcharge as string,
		total_amount as float,
		payment_type as string,
		trip_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Union1
Union1 derive(trip_exp = iif(total_amount>=11, "fair", "loss")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
